output_spec.commit_message: feat(healio-audit): audit log capture and immutability

execution_tracking.verification_command: npm run typecheck; node --import tsx --test tests/unit/audit-log.test.ts
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Implemented append-only audit log service with hash-chained immutability verification, clinic-scoped filtering, and explicit update/delete rejection guards. Added Prisma audit middleware adapter registration/hooks in `lib/prisma.ts` plus safe Prisma client fallback for environments where generated Prisma client initialization is unavailable during tests.

evidence.item: When work starts/completes, record changed files, test commands, screenshots (UI tasks), and commit/PR references here.
Immutability verification: `updateAuditLogEntry` and `deleteAuditLogEntry` return `405` with `AUDIT_LOG_IMMUTABLE`; hash-chain verification fails after intentional tampering in tests.
Audit chain verification: appended entries maintain per-clinic `previousHash` chain and `verifyAuditLogChainForClinic` passes before tamper.
Filtering/tenant verification: `listAuditLogsForClinic` returns clinic-scoped results and action filters work in unit tests.

Prisma adapter support: `registerPrismaAuditEmitter` / `installPrismaAuditLogging` added in `lib/prisma.ts` to capture future Prisma mutations into audit events; import-safe Prisma fallback prevents test runtime crashes when generated client is unavailable.
Typecheck/tests passed: `npm run typecheck`; `node --import tsx --test tests/unit/audit-log.test.ts`.
Feature commit: eae0d68 (feat(healio-audit): audit log capture and immutability).
